C

capacity - Variable in class edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLine
The capacity variable represents the size of the array that each TextLine object creates.
capacity() - Method in class edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLine
This simply returns the value of the capacity variable of the TextLine object.

D

DEFAULT_SIZE - Static variable in class edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLine
This is a constant that represents the generic size of each of the arrays.

E

edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff - package edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff
 
equals(Object) - Method in class edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLine
This method simply returns true if all of the characters in the character array of one object equals the characters in the character array of another.

I

indexOf(String) - Method in class edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLine
This method locates the first occurance of the fragment given in the parameters of the method within the TextLine object itself.
indexOf(String, int) - Method in class edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLine
This method does the same as the other overloaded method with the same name in this class, but instead of looking for the fragment starting from charArray[0], the method begins its search from charArray[index] from within the object.
insert(int, String) - Method in interface edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLine.Editable
 

L

length() - Method in class edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLine
This method returns the length of the TextLine object by counting things that are not null character instances.

replace(int, int, String) - Method in interface edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLine.Editable
 

T

TextLine - Class in edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff
This class contains constructors and methods for a class intended to handle a line of text, store it as an character array, and represent this data in certain ways.
TextLine() - Constructor for class edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLine
This constructs an empty TextLine object with the default size constant as the capacity of the object's internal charArray.
TextLine(String) - Constructor for class edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLine
This constructs a TextLine object that contains the string given in the parameter individually within the object's internal charArray.
TextLine.Editable - Interface in edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff
This interface is later to be implemented in the editableTextLine class.
TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException - Exception in edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff
This class contains all of the exceptions and variation of exceptions that are required for the unique needs of the EditableTextLine class.
TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException() - Constructor for exception edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException
This constructor is for an exception that calls on its parent class whenever thrown.
TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException(String) - Constructor for exception edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException
This constructor is for an exception that calls on its parent class whenever thrown.
TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException(int) - Constructor for exception edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLineIndexOutOfBoundsException
This constructor occurs uniquely from within the EditableTExt class.
toString() - Method in class edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLine
This method returns a string representing the values stored within the TextLine object's charArray.
